item.description: this is super thorough, and in my opinion, represents the future of the social web https://atproto.com/guides/overview
testing out using my git changelog instead of checking length of the xml entries, because that didn't work.
it seems to be working fully... this is a test post https://jordanreger.com
posts like these are syndicated (https://indieweb.org/POSSE) via an xml file on my site. i like this quite a lot better than posting on separate platforms.
